column6: The program's horrifying master plan is finally revealed and X-23 is sent on her most vicious mission yet, the ramifications of which will turn the Facility on its head...All the anger, pain, and betrayal come to a boil in this issue.
column8: | colorist:Brian Haberlin | writer:Craig Kyle | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Jonathan Sibal | penciller (cover):Billy Tan
